title: Grafitti on a post
description: A tank is visible in the background. Photographer's description: Protestors before & after Mubarak and how they show happy, photos of Ahmed Shafik speaking at his place. Text in image:  كلنا مصريون. اصحوا . Translation of Text in image: We are all Egyptians. Wake up
collection: University on the Square: Documenting Egypt's 21st Century Revolution
